trans-unit.source: Specifies processing rules or option settings for the <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader" /> XAML reader implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader" /> XAML 读取器实现指定处理规则或选项设置。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReaderSettings" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReaderSettings" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReaderSettings" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReaderSettings" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The existing <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReaderSettings" /> object to copy.
trans-unit.target: 要复制的现有 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReaderSettings" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReaderSettings" /> class by copying settings from an existing <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReaderSettings" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 通过从现有 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReaderSettings" /> 对象中复制设置来初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReaderSettings" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the underlying stream or text reader should be closed when the <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader" /> is closed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader" /> 关闭时，是否应关闭基础流或文本读取器。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the underlying stream or reader should be closed when the <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader" /> is closed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果当 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader" /> 关闭时基础流或读取器也应关闭，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether the reader should differ from the default <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader" /> behavior of how markup compatibility content is processed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定读取器是否应与如何处理标记兼容性内容这一默认 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader" /> 行为有所区别。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the initiating reader is directly used, which means that XML compatibility markup is processed as part of the main stream and compatibility is not considered.
trans-unit.target: 如果直接使用启动读取器（这意味着将 XML 兼容性标记作为主要流的一部分进行处理，而不考虑兼容性），则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> if the default behavior is used, which processes XML compatibility separately.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用默认行为（即单独处理 XML 兼容性），则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default handling behavior for XML markup compatibility in <xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader> is that the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader>, as provided for initialization, is wrapped in a created internal helper class.
trans-unit.target: 默认值处理为 XML 标记中的兼容性的行为<xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader>在于<xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader>，如提供以进行初始化，包装在创建内部帮助程序类。

trans-unit.source: This helper class reads the markup compatibility nodes separately and enters into the nodes based on markup compatibility of the schema context.
trans-unit.target: 此帮助器类单独读取标记兼容性节点，并将输入到基于标记的架构上下文的兼容性的节点。

trans-unit.source: Suggested scenarios for setting <xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReaderSettings.SkipXmlCompatibilityProcessing%2A> to `true` are:
trans-unit.target: 设置的情况下，建议<xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReaderSettings.SkipXmlCompatibilityProcessing%2A>到`true`是：

trans-unit.source: You want to keep any markup compatibility content in the primary XAML stream.
trans-unit.target: 你想要保留主 XAML 流中的任何标记兼容性内容。

trans-unit.source: You have already processed the markup compatibility because you are using a reader that can process markup compatibility content inline.
trans-unit.target: 你已处理标记兼容性，因为您正在使用的读取器可以处理标记兼容性内容内联。

trans-unit.source: You choose to ignore XML compatibility conventions in your XAML reader implementation for reasons of performance.
trans-unit.target: 你选择忽略 XML 兼容性约定 XAML 读取器的实现中原因性能。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the language setting value that the reader may promote to writers that write <see langword="xml:lang" /> attributes in nodes.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置语言设置值，该值确定读取器可能提升到在节点中写出 <see langword="xml:lang" /> 特性的编写器。

trans-unit.source: The string to use for possible <see langword="xml:lang" /> output that is based on the reader.
trans-unit.target: 要用于基于读取器的可能 <see langword="xml:lang" /> 输出的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The caller is responsible for making sure that the string you provide is appropriate for `xml:lang` usage.
trans-unit.target: 调用方负责确保您提供的字符串适用于`xml:lang`使用情况。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether the XAML reader instructs any XAML writers to write <see langword="xml:space" /> attributes in nodes.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定 XAML 读取器是否让任何 XAML 编写器在节点中写入 <see langword="xml:space" /> 特性。

trans-unit.source: If that behavior is desired, this information is passed through shared XAML schema context.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要该行为，则此信息会通过共享 XAML 架构上下文传递。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if writers that are processing the XAML node stream can write <c>xml:space="preserve"</c> in output; <see langword="false" /> if <see langword="xml:space" /> attributes cannot be written in nodes.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果正在处理 XAML 节点流的编写器可以编写<c>xml: space ="preserve"</c>输出; 中<see langword="false" />如果<see langword="xml:space" />属性不能写入节点中。

trans-unit.source: The XML whitespace concepts are not robust enough to apply to XAML, and are typically ignored by XAML readers.
trans-unit.target: XML 空白概念不适用于 XAML，足够可靠，并通常忽略 XAML 读取器。
